scripts.fix_sharp_local: echo 'Fixing sharp local installation' && rm -rf node_modules/sharp && npm install sharp
scripts.fix_sharp_aws: echo 'Fixing sharp aws installation'&& npm install && rm -rf node_modules/sharp && SHARP_IGNORE_GLOBAL_LIBVIPS=1 npm install --arch=x64 --platform=linux --libc=glibc sharp
